alert.note: Alert for Bitterroot, Sapphire Mountains (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Missoula (Western Montana and Central Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 25 at 2:34AM MST until December 25 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Missoula
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Heavy mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations between one tenth of an inch and a quarter inch. * WHERE...Bitterroot/Sapphire Mountains. * WHEN...Until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Travel could be nearly impossible, particularly on Highway 12 from Lolo Pass to Lolo. Local power outages and tree damage are possible due to the ice.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
